866480.name: I.E.L : Indo European Languages
866480.description:
IEL: Indo European Languages is a 2D educational game that helps you learn and explore languages including French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Dutch, Danish, Norwegian, Swedish, and more.

ğŸ“ Language Tutorials
Master the basics: phrases, vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation in over 20 languages. Lessons cover everyday topics to help build real-world communication skills.

ğŸ® Features

  • Learn key topics: alphabet, numbers, days, months, seasons, directions, colors, weather, time, family, animals, and more

  • Dive into grammar: verbs, nouns, adjectives, pronouns, adverbs, negatives, and common phrases

  • Explore famous landmarks and cities like the Eiffel Tower, Colosseum, Paris, Madrid, and more through an interactive museum

  • Practice through mini-games designed to test and reinforce your knowledge

  • Enjoy beautifully designed backgrounds representing each country

Whether you're starting fresh or brushing up, IEL turns language learning into an immersive adventure.
